title: Evaluation of suitability and biodegradability of the organophosphate insecticides to mitigate insecticide pollution in onion farming
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Nusrat Fatimah, Suhail Ashraf, Krishna Nayana R U, P.B. Anju, Mansoor Showkat, Kahkashan Perveen, Najat A. Bukhari, R.Z. Sayyed, Andrea Mastinu
